data.eml:eml: New species and records of alpheid shrimps, genera Salmoneus Holthuis and Parabetaeus Coutière, from the tropical western Atlantic (Decapoda, Caridea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur (2007): New species and records of alpheid shrimps, genera Salmoneus Holthuis and Parabetaeus Coutière, from the tropical western Atlantic (Decapoda, Caridea). Zootaxa 1653: 21-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179791
